Job Title: Sales and Market Analyst

Location: Riverside, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Job Description

Here are some of the benefits that we offer:

 Medical, Dental & Vision Insurance  401K Plan + Match  Paid vacation and Time Off  Tuition reimbursement  Growth opportunities 

Responsibilities:

Sales 

 Research and compile competitive analysis and provide recommendations as to how the sales, marketing, and other teams utilize this data to grow the company  Monitor Sales performance; develop and adjust strategies and pricing to exceed budgets and mitigate revenue shortfalls  Build, generate, and analyze reports utilizing Excel, Power BI, etc.  Examine monthly, quarterly, and annual reports to identify trends, patterns, and areas for growth or improvement  Maintain organized sales records, assist in setting Sales goals, report month-end results, and provide presentations to the senior management team  Collaborate with senior sales staff in weekly meetings  Monitor and organize inventory while effectively tracking new services and products for sale  Attend essential sales training meetings and develop an understanding of all the company's services and products 

Market

 Conduct research to analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitive landscape, and prepare reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing data  Coordinate with the marketing team on how to run successful campaigns, or work with the supply chain team to optimize production or inventory  Support in evaluating and establishing the marketing plan and strategy by assembling and analyzing sales forecasts, planning and organizing promotional presentations, and updating calendars  Continually seek and research new sources of prospective customer/market data, and provide recommendations to sales and marketing leadership; emerging markets  Other duties as assigned. 

Education: 

 BS/BA in business administration, sales or relevant field 

Qualifications:

 Proven working experience in sales or a marketing role  Sales forecasting, statistical or predictive modeling, and proficiency in statistical software  Strong written and oral communication skills  Experience in customer support is a plus  Market knowledge  Ability to build rapport  Time management and planning skills 

The annual base pay range for this position is $67,480 - $106,040. If you are hired, your annual base pay will be determined based on factors such as geographic location, skills, education, and/or experience. In addition to those factors, we believe in the importance of pay equity and consider internal equity of our current team members as part of any final offer. Please keep in mind that the range mentioned above is the full base pay range for the role. Hiring at the maximum of the range would not be typical in order to allow for future and continued wage growth.
